body:
Comment 5: 
As I said I was able to caught it red-handed in a synthetic environment (by inserting
sleep in markfreed). It probably leads to an actual corruption very infrequently as any
race. But I don't see anything that would make probability insignificant either. One
word of GC bitmap covers 128 bytes of user memory, so doing selects can trigger this
race.
I vote for inclusion in 1.3.1.
